nimble strike.effect: shift 1 before or after. ranged attack

evasive strike.effect: shift 1 + wis before or after. ranged or melee attack

crucial advice.effect: ENCOUNTER-- An ally gets a bonus to a skill check in a skill you are trained in equal to wis

second chance.effect: DAILY-- When you are hit by an enemy, force them to roll again

split tree.effect: attack 2 character within 3 spaces. Roll attack twice use higher
